Reviews.Title: Sleek, fast, worth the upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: With an improved camera interface and super fast camera, and a noticeably faster processor, the iPhone 4S is a must upgrade for anyone with an iPhone 4 or older. Siri also saves a lot of time and allows for hands-free texting, calling, and music selection. Siri makes a great driving companion and helper during the cold when wearing gloves don't allow me to easily use the touch screen.In the past month since I bought this, I've been very happy I opted for the pricier 64GB iPhone since I no longer need to delete apps, and cut my music or photo albums to fit on a 32 GB. If you can sell your smaller iPhone 4S, the 64 GB may be a nice switch. I also really like the Black and the iOS 6 upgrade on this phone - definitely won't be needing an iPhone 5 with this.

Reviews.Title: Why I purchased the iPhone 4S w 64 GB.
Reviews.Author: Susan M. Schroeder "SS"
Reviews.Content: I had checked out the iPhone 5 but it doesn't come with Google Maps.  I wanted Google Maps (use them in connection with my Contacts) and the same size as my old iPhone 3Gs 16GB.  I also record video clips and need more GB so I had been looking for this very iPhone 4S 64GB in Black. The Apple Store, Best Buy, WalMart and AT&T; stores no longer carry this iPhone 4S with 64GB. My next search was, of course, AMAZON.com!  While scanning through the iPhone section - there it was!  The price was right, the condition: Used - Very good and it met all my critieria.  I am now using it and it is just like new!The iPhone arrived in good time, was packed well and the phone was in it's original, like new, box with unopened earbuds, and charging tools and two, untouched manuals.SS

Reviews.Title: Like new my left foot.
Reviews.Author: Dudely Duderight
Reviews.Content: Dinged up pretty bad when I got it from Amazon Warehouse. Just because it has packaging doesn't mean it's like new.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great price!
Reviews.Author: LostWorlds "LostWorlds.org"
Reviews.Content: I simply couldn't pass up the amazing price on this refurbished unit! And it works like new, looks like new. I'd never have known it was a refurbished unit had they not said so.

Reviews.Title: Fast Shipped
Reviews.Author: BacHoBiSida
Reviews.Content: My phone looked like  new and works great. I have it on a straight talk plan and couldn't be happier with both! Clean ESD.Thanks for the sale!

Reviews.Title: You asked
Reviews.Author: Mark Anthony
Reviews.Content: The phone is not inVery Good condition as posted.  The face and back have highly visible scratches along with chips around the edges.  The speaker screens are dirty and so is the charger intake.  The camera doesn't seem to work when taking selfies.  That's what's wrong so far.

Reviews.Title: Used iPhone 4s with 64GB
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I have been using the 2 iPhone 4s now for over a month without any problems. I upgraded from a 16GB and now I don't have to worry about running out of memory. I chose to stay with the 4s while waiting for the iPhone 6.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Desimone "Joe D."
Reviews.Content: Bought this used and activated it with Straight Talk. Could not be happier. Well maybe a little. Needed a phone for retirement since I will not have my work phone. Did not want to be tied into a contract and I don't need the latest technology. This was the perfect solution for me. Would not hesitate to use the seller again. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: HOW DID I LIVE WITHOUT THIS?
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: I'm not a huge social media person, not having anything but a FB account, so I saw this device as frivolous for my needs. However, this consolidated all of my devices (phone, music, calendar, email, etc.) into one completely reliable one. I'll never go back to a non-apple phone again.

Reviews.Title: Was not in "Like new" condition
Reviews.Author: Parag Shah
Reviews.Content: Had a few scratches on top left corner as if the phone had been fallen and hit a hard surface. I had bought an iPhone earlier from Amazon and it was sent to me in much better condition.Hope it was just a mistake on Amazon's part.

Reviews.Title: love the phone
Reviews.Author: Christine Kam "Poodle Lover"
Reviews.Content: but there is something not quite right about it. My old 4s just recently died so I decided to get another one to tie me over till I'm available for upgrade, but this one sometimes closes my programs unexpectedly, or I get a strange blinky thing on the screen. At least it works most of the time, though.

Reviews.Title: No complaints after a year!
Reviews.Author: mykeboy01
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone after having a bad week...My blackberry of 6 years stopped working, and I couldn't find replacements to that model. (8900)My iPod (series 1 nano) stopped accepting a charge after almost 8 years of heavy useage.I figured I would kill two birds with one stone & replace both with one purchase. Although I was weary about purchasing a refurbished phone from Amazon w/ no warranty attached, I went with it...and I have never been happier!I went from 4GB of music potential to 64GB! Now I can have all the apps, play music and video, and have a cellphone that doesn't fight me like the Blackberry (god rest its soul) did to me half the time.My only gripe is that the camera isn't that great...ALTHOUGH, it does offer a front facing camera, so I can check my hair and such. Certainly a great purchase, and would do it again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Great product, as advertised
Reviews.Author: Gary E Licquia
Reviews.Content: Phone was listed in like new condition and arrived in perfect condition! Works great, couldn't be happier. Will definitely look to upgrade to another previously used iPhone in the future.

Reviews.Title: i had a lot of problems with my iphone 5s and probably go back to my iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: chaik george
Reviews.Content: its not as big but works great and has a lot more memory.and the battery seems too last way longer than my iPhone 5s

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S 64GB (Black) - AT&T;
Reviews.Author: A. El-hilali "shopper"
Reviews.Content: Apple iPhone 4S 64GB (Black) is a bit expensive for a 2 version older phone but it was as expected clean and functional

Reviews.Title: Extremely pleased with this purchase.
Reviews.Author: hlnewton
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this phone. Been an Apple iPhone user since the first generation came out. My only purpose in buying this one was to upgrade from my 4S 16GB iPhone to a 4S 64GB iPhone. It arrived in its box with all the items that are included in the purchase of any new iPhone. Shipping was as expected and it arrived in perfect condition. I love it. I gave my 4S 16GB to my 7th grader (her first phone) and kept this 64GB for myself. Extremely pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the savings
Reviews.Author: Tammy Beaubouef
Reviews.Content: This phone is not available in retail stores, (I'm pretty certain). So I was glad to find one. My old phone was insured. I replaced it with a better model at the cost of my deductible plus the money I received for selling my old phone. My insurgence plan wanted the deductible AND send them my old phone. Amazon was a great source. As well as I got a great phone.

Reviews.Title: My son is enjoying his phone.
Reviews.Author: Peyton
Reviews.Content: My son is enjoying his phone. My only problem is getting his attention away from the phone and on other things. lol

Reviews.Title: They said it was new, it was used!!!
Reviews.Author: Marvin J.
Reviews.Content: I am an I Phone 4s fan.  I ordered an I phone 4S 64GB just to have incase mine broke and needed a new phone.  The phone was ordered on March 1st of 2013.  I located a phone and ordered it from K & K Reality Enterprises.  It was listed as a NEW phone.  I received the phone and put it away until last week.  As I opened the package it seemed to be original packaging.  I pealed off the clear box sticker and noticed it said 16GB.  I then was reading the bottom description picture and it said it was the Apple 4s 64GB.  I then noticed the sticker was covering another sticker.  I continued to open the box and noticed the charging cable, the ear piece cable and the phone to be USED.  Unfortunately it was to late to return the product.  I didn't mind spending the money to buy the phone, but it bothers me that this company doesn't care about their reputation.  BEWARE OF SELLER!!!!!

Reviews.Title: The Best Smartphone.
Reviews.Author: VG
Reviews.Content: Have looked at other smartphones, but, find the iPhone to be more user friendly. If you want the best go with the iPhone.VG

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Bob Roush "a Jeep guy"
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple iPhones before, I just never buy them new as I cannot see paying the price for a new one and do not want to be committed to a two year commitment.  With that said, I really enjoy my iPhone 4S, it is a good size and has enough memory for the apps that I use.I also like it because I I can sync with my Macbook Pro and my iPad as well as backup to my Time Capsule!  I get good reception from my carrier and use wifi when available for many things.I have not used another brand cell phone for so many years that I so I cannot compare it to any of the other smart phones out there, but I like Apple products and so I stick with it, it meets my needs and is compatible and similar to my other products.

Reviews.Title: Rony Moreno
Reviews.Author: Rony Moreno
Reviews.Content: Excellent product only came with a small detail in a corner, but not important, general phone accessories and in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: My Favorite Apple Product
Reviews.Author: ljc808
Reviews.Content: I got this from Amazon Warehouse used like new and it's very nice but the box was not the original,  the model numbers did not match(But that's not important). Everything works great so far and the charger, wall adapter, and headphones is wrapped brand new. I have not tested the accessories yet due to I have ones from previous devices. No marks or scratches on phone and I bought this replacement due to my original 4s was stolen. I love the 4s due to it's audio quality with apple lossless using my V Moda M100, it just sounds awesome together even with Tune In radio app. So I originally got the iPhone 5 to replace my stolen phone but while every feature was an upgrade the music audio quality through the headphone jack was not. It seems the 4s bass is a lot better on 4s than the iPhone 4 and 5, and everything sounds more balanced on the 4s . Now don't get me wrong it's not that the audio on the iPhone 4 or 5 is bad, actually it's pretty good but not like the 4s. For me that's the main deal breaker my phone's audio quality and it all started with the iPhone 4 I never realized how great music can sound on a phone. The 4s capabilities of other features is just gravy for me, and it's pictures is really nice plus the internet is fast enough for me on 3g. I get great signal here in Las Vegas where you probably seen on the commercial it's the number one carrier here. But something I never expected happened, while I was on at&t;'s website updating everything with this new phone I saw a link to an online unlock device form. Now I have three lines on at&t; and this was replacing the phone that was stolen which the line was still under contract until 2014. So I figured what the heck I filled out the application to unlock my 4s and 4 hours later got an email back that your phone is approved to be unlocked. So I followed the procedure a few hours later due to it said to wait at least 24 hours, iTunes came back with the response congratulations your iPhone is unlocked(Sweet). I think I was approved while still under contract is because this phone which is locked to at&t; but not under contract itself. So guys if you buy this and still under contract or not just go to at&t;'s website after purchasing and fill out the form and you too will have a new factory unlocked phone. This is a permanent unlock and can be used on any gsm carrier just by switching the sim card and how great is that your phone's value just went up. See link  http://www.cultofmac.com/189360/att-may-factory-unlock-your-on-contract-iphone-if-you-ask-nicely/

Reviews.Title: Good phone and not-so-good accessories
Reviews.Author: Shihui Yuan
Reviews.Content: Phone is very new, very good, fully in line with the classification of "like new".Only the attachment is not very good, the plug of the data cable is a little tight.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: John Coston
Reviews.Content: Best phone so far with Mac apps like music and calendar. The phone is pretty fast, too. The 64gig really comes in handy for lots of music and videos.

Reviews.Title: no problem shipment
Reviews.Author: victor atterberry
Reviews.Content: I received what I asked and paid for, the item arrived as expected and the product worked without any problems

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: HappyDog
Reviews.Content: IPhone 4S product quality very good, thank you, very fast, especially new products, I very love,this is a good pruduct.

Reviews.Title: Happy I didn't go with the iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: juanita beatty
Reviews.Content: I got everything I wanted upgrading from my iPhone 4 without having to change out all my accessories - very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Decided on this between a new phone and ebay, and made the right choice
Reviews.Author: Ann Droid "anndr0id"
Reviews.Content: Going with Amazon was the best bet for me and I'm glad about the choice. 4 stars just because the phone was missing the sim tray. the new 5 has a new plug (my speakers wouldn't work with it) and the faster chip wasn't a big deal for me since I don't run intensive games/apps. The phone works perfect and was a great upgrade from a 32gb 4!

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: maneboro
Reviews.Content: El iphone trabaja muy bien en condiciones mucho mejor de lo que esperaba excelente compra excelente teléfono el mejor del mundo

Reviews.Title: Great !!!!
Reviews.Author: Roger L. Serwack, Sr.
Reviews.Content: Phone is Great, no comlaints except  it does not take 19 words to express that. So fix this word requirement or no more feedback from me!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: It's an iPhone - what else is there to say
Reviews.Author: Brian M Marsh
Reviews.Content: The performance of iPhone's are legendary. That is why it is THE benchmark these days in mobile communication devices. The extra space allows me to keep all my music and even a couple of movies on it for long trips.The battery life is really good, but I highly recommend the Boostcase products. They give me almost 24 hours of usable battery life.

Reviews.Title: The USB Line Is Fake!
Reviews.Author: wps
Reviews.Content: The USB Line Is Fake,and it's with poor quality.Consider that it will make harm to the  iphone,I am not gonna use this bad USB Line!

Reviews.Title: Works but has a lot of issues
Reviews.Author: Mekdes
Reviews.Content: This iphone has a lot of issues, short battery life, some icons don't work (like camera), freezes a lot (every now and then)Would be very nice if these problems were mentioned. That is very unethical.

Reviews.Title: not like described
Reviews.Author: feniks
Reviews.Content: the phone was described like a new,unlocked------- It was not like a new,lot of scratches behind,like it was any cat surfing on it,and was not unlocked,so i had to pay extra to unlock it,and was no packagin.This time im really suprised

Reviews.Title: Amazing deals for amazing prices.
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Rose Hamilton
Reviews.Content: Amazon Warehouse deals are hands down the best in my opinion. I was looking for an iPhone 4S mainly for the camera. I have an Ipad2 and was considering a mini but the camera wasn't nearly as good. I didnt want to have to sign up for a contract with a cellular service provider simply to get  the phone that I wanted. After doing some research on the internet and reading about used iPhones and what to look for and how to quality test a purchase I thought that used might be the route for me. So long story short, I turned to Amazon. While browsing used phones and reading reviews I stumbled upon the Amazon Waehouse seller profile. At first I was hesitant because the product was listed without a condition description but after reading the seller profile information I found that they were claiming the product to be like new. Yet even with such a line I thought "hmmmmm I might say it was like new if I wanted to charge someone $400 too." Well a new 16gb iPhone 4S from apple costs a charming $549.00 pre tax. So the $400 for a 64gb phone that will meet my desires seems like a good deal but its still more than I was willing to spend on a chance... that is until I read the satisfaction guarantee clause. Amazon Warehouse apparently offers a 30day trial with free return shipping if you are not satisfied with the product or the quality of purchased item. So with that extra measure of security in place I decided to purchase the phone and I must say that I am ANYTHING but disappointed. It has had an outstanding battery life, no dead spots for the pixels, all the factory applications work, more memory than I could have dreamed of and best of all a WONDERFUL camera. I have told all of my friends about what a great deal I scored and now they have been consulting the Amazon Warehouse page for like new items they are looking to purchase.  I'd recommend it to anyone especially with the 30 free shipping return policy. It's hard to go wrong. And with the out of box warranty offered by Square Trade I felt pretty secure making a purchase that I could also insure.

Reviews.Title: Horrible experience! Stay away!
Reviews.Author: Anjelika Olson
Reviews.Content: I have purchased Iphone 4s on Oct 2011 before it came out for my boss and they listed as "unlocked" yet when we received the item it was locked with At&T;! When I contacted regarding this the WorldWide Distributors indicated that they never promised such thing and that it is non-refundable! Ridiculous! They would ignore my inquiries and emails! Hold tight, this was not the end: my boss gave me the phone stating to use it as the small sim card was not available yet in Europe and he didn't want to go through the hassle of unlocking it. Anyway, when I charged and turned on the phone it wouldn't activate with my sim card; then I brought it to the At&T; store and they had the same issue: "the activation server is not available". At& after keeping the phone for the day were unable to resolve and I had to bring it to Apple. At the Apple they had problems as well and they ended up swapping a phone with a new one. If you are a buyer, beware of this seller's customer service, because it sucks!

ProductInfo.Features:
Locked to AT&T; without contract
8 mega pixel camera with full 1080p video recording
Siri voice assistant
iCloud, App Store, Air Print, Retina display
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 4S 64GB (Black) - AT&T
